item.description:
Solstice luminaria is ON!  See you in the garden!

 

Greetings -

I am hoping the rain clears up - but if not - sadly this event will be cancelled.

 

 

The Leland Community Garden is hosting their annual Solstice Celebration of Friday, 12/21. This ‘not-to-be-missed’ event is a long held tradition with candles, hot mulled cider, caroling and a beautiful community celebration of winter. Activities begin around 6:30P and go on well in to the night.
item.name: Winter Solstice Celebration at the Leland Street Community Garden
